text: 14.21: Ais 28.11-12; Zo 10.34Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ nzuai, “Guma Bakɨme khaŋ nzuai, ‘Gu gumgir panan harigi ŋgui kaar vhov, gu won gumgi gu mbigi ga suanga. Gu harigi ŋgui gumgi ga suaŋrim, mbe ŋgɨp na buni bun nan gumgi gu mbigira suanga. Gu mbe kaŋgi, mbe na buni mbararargeŋ vuzvugirga fhu.’ ”
